docs.snippet: One of the country’s most powerful financial firms and one of its most famous political families have a long-running and mutually beneficial relationship....
docs.lead_paragraph: One of the country’s most powerful financial firms and one of its most famous political families have a long-running and mutually beneficial relationship.
docs.abstract: Bill and Hillary Clinton both defended Goldman Sachs and reinforced their relationship to company as it came under fire for its role in 2008 financial crash; Clinton family's deepened ties to company blamed for America's economic malaise has cast doubts on Hillary Clinton's pledges to rein in Wall Street and damaged her trustworthiness.

headline.main: 2008 Crisis Deepened the Ties Between Clintons and Goldman Sachs
headline.print_headline: Clintons Drew Goldman Close as Crisis Struck
